title: Best of The Program | 5/24/21
description:
Are gender transition surgeries ethical? "60 Minutes" interviewed a woman who detransitioned. Glenn breaks down why the American Medical Association’s support for critical race theory is dangerous. The Israeli-Palestinian conflict has sparked antisemitic attacks reminiscent of the 1930s in America, and nobody is covering it. Glenn compares military ads from Russia and the U.S. and warns of danger if our military continues going woke.
